languages.text: Труп был расчленен и затем собран вновь — судя по всему, еще при жизни. Многочисленные швы и ожоги свидетельствуют о том, что хирург не задумывался о гуманном обращении.

traits.locale_text: [draft] на трупе видны как старые швы, так и свежие следы скальпеля

languages.text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.
languages.original_text: Труп был расчленен и затем собран вновь — судя по всему, еще при жизни. Многочисленные швы и ожоги свидетельствуют о том, что хирург не задумывался о гуманном обращении.

traits.locale_text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon did not think about humane treatment.
The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon did not think about humane treatment.
The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.
The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.

languages.text: Le cadavre a été démembré puis réassemblé... alors qu'il était encore en vie, semble-t-il. Les nombreux points de suture et brûlures indiquent que le chirurgien ne se souciait guère de la déontologie.
languages.original_text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.

traits.locale_text: Le cadavre a été démembré puis réassemblé... alors qu'il était encore en vie, semble-t-il. Les nombreux points de suture et brûlures indiquent que le chirurgien ne se souciait guère de la déontologie.

languages.text: 很显然，这具尸体还活着的时候就遭到了肢解，随后被重新拼合起来。尸体上大量缝针与烧伤表明，负责进行手术的外科医生根本没有考虑过人道的治疗手段。
languages.original_text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.

traits.locale_text: 很显然，这具尸体还活着的时候就遭到了肢解，随后被重新拼合起来。尸体上大量缝针与烧伤表明，负责进行手术的外科医生根本没有考虑过人道的治疗手段。

languages.text: この死体は、どうやら生きながらバラバラにされたあと、再びつなぎ合わされたようだ。多数の縫い目と火傷から、外科医が人道的な治療に関心がなかったことは明らかだ。
languages.original_text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.

traits.locale_text: この死体は、どうやら生きながらバラバラにされたあと、再びつなぎ合わされたようだ。多数の縫い目と火傷から、外科医が人道的な治療に関心がなかったことは明らかだ。

languages.text: Die Leiche wurde erst zerstückelt und dann wieder zusammengeflickt – und das bei lebendigem Leib.
languages.original_text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.

traits.locale_text: Die Leiche wurde erst zerstückelt und dann wieder zusammengeflickt – und das bei lebendigem Leib. Die zahlreiche Nähten und Verbrennungen machen deutlich, dass der Chirurg keine humane Behandlung im Sinn hatte.

languages.text: El cadáver ha sido desmembrado y vuelto a coser; en vida, aparentemente. Las numerosas suturas y quemaduras indican que el cirujano trató a la víctima sin tener en consideración un trato humanitario.
languages.original_text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.

traits.locale_text: El cadáver ha sido desmembrado y vuelto a coser; en vida, aparentemente. Las numerosas suturas y quemaduras indican que el cirujano trató a la víctima sin ningún miramiento por su agonía.

languages.text: Ceset önce parçalara ayrılmış, ardından yeniden birleştirilmiş. Görünüşe göre kurban, bu sırada hâlâ hayattaymış. Üzerindeki sayısız dikiş ve yanık, cerrahın insani bir muamele yapma gibi bir kaygısının olmadığını işaret ediyor.
languages.original_text: The corpse was dismembered and then reassembled — apparently, while still alive. Numerous stitches and burns indicate that the surgeon was not concerned with humane treatment.

traits.locale_text: Ceset önce parçalara ayrılmış, ardından yeniden birleştirilmiş ve kurban görünüşe göre bu sırada hâlâ hayattaymış. Üzerindeki sayısız dikiş ve yanık, cerrahın insani bir muamele yapma gibi bir kaygısının bulunmadığına işaret ediyor.
